column5: A great way to leave the suburban or city life behind and just unwind in nature! We have 55 acres of wooded trails and rolling meadows and a quiet lake to enjoy. So relax and disconnect with some meditation for awhile.   This is the perfect place to get away and destress, enjoy nature & the bask in the energy of multiple spiritual retreats that have been held in this amazing space.  For an additional price you can arrange for a unique Massage during your stay, or an aromatic Meditation Ceremony.
